properties.content: Condition: Excellent - Minor scuffs on the case, fully functional.
Lightly used MacBook Pro in excellent condition. Battery health at 85%. Includes original charger. Selling due to upgrade.

issues: - Do all native-text elements have layoutSizingHorizontal: "FILL" instead of "HUG"? // no
- Do content containers have itemSpacing between children (8, 12, 16, or 24)? // no
- Are three-panel layouts structured as: Header (auto) + Content (layoutGrow: 1) + Footer (auto)? // yes
- Are all component IDs using "componentNodeId" (not "id" or "componentId")? // no
- Are there width properties on any native-text elements? // no (but potential issue with implicit width)
changes: - Changed `"componentId"` to `"componentNodeId"` in all component instances.
